column5: Alexander Morton has been fighting for the survival of  BC wild salmon stocks for years. The Cohen Inquiry is now on in BC but finally DFO information has been released backing  her fears.   http://alexandramorton.typepad.com/

Thank you for putting this up for people to read desship! This is a serious issue facing all canadians and think that everyone should read the link you gave. Very unfortunate that the DFO would attempt to bar this information and stay in the pocket of the salmon farmers. The provincial Govt should be ashamed of itself for not taking action on this, knowing full well what happened to the Cod fishery out East. People don't seem to learn... Thanks again for sharing.
interesting article.  although i'm not sure how Stephen Harper imposing gag orders on scientists means the DFO is "barring information".  he's also done it to climatologists.
